name: Objective: Survive (akaleaf)
description:
The number of zombies is getting bigger every second, and they themselves are getting faster and faster. Will you have time to kill all the zombie bosses before you die? Can you kill more than 200 zombies?

Zombie bosses will appear on 50, 60, 70, 80, 90 and 100 killed zombies. They have much more health and are more dangerous.

Zombies can see you, they hear you. But sometimes they sleep, in which case they do not see you, but if you decide to make some noise nearby, they will hear you.

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Shooting and targeting - by mouse
R - restart the game
Escape - close the game
F3 - debug mode, in which you can see how zombies can hear and see the player.
